_header: The feast of Holy Thursday is both noble and rich
_description: The Feast of the Ascension, in some MSS of the South English Legendary

BLEge2810.First Lines: Þe feste of holi þursdai is boþe noble & richevor þulk day ur swete lorde steȝe to heuene riche…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …And gode uor is grace us graunte be so sleȝeþat we mote to him come in to heuene & heȝe

Lam223.First Lines:
Now comes Aster in diuerse stiddes þerfore men mot lereWhich
                    tyme our lord ros & which tyme of þe ȝere…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…He steye into heuen with his woundes fiveAls hit falles on
                    holy þoresday þat he con to heuen styeBut firste holy chirche hit
                    helde þe feste of letanye
